TitleEnglish: To Me, the One Who Loved You
SummaryEnglish: Koyomi Hidaka and Shiori Sato meet at his fatherâ€™s research center and begin to fall in love, but so do their parents, who eventually marry. To avoid becoming stepsiblings, they decide to run away to a parallel universe. Traveling between dimensions is common in their world, but not without repercussions. Does a universe exist for the young couple, and what will it cost them to find it?
Aliases: Kimi wo Aishita Hitori no Boku e
To the Solitary Me That Loved You
To the Solitary Me Who Loved You
